name: Farmvillians
description:
You just inherited a farm from your grandfather. You slowly build up your farm, slowly forming trust with the locals before a terrible blight swept the nation leaving you with some crops useless. But the bills wait for no one, so you have to push through this struggle and keep on relationships. If you don’t, someone you know may die or leave the town, losing you a customer.

Developer: David Abaya, Elunga Mkunde, Donnacha Lohan Davy 

Song by Stories in the Dawn - Beautiful Piano Song by BigRicePiano
